text: Wuthering Heights is a 1920 British silent drama movie directed by A. V. Bramble. The movie is based on the 1847 novel by Emily Brontë. The movie has the same name as Brontë's novel. It stars Milton Rosmer, Ann Trevor, Colette Brettel, Warwick Ward, Cecil Morton York, Cyril Raymond, Dora De Winton. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:British silent movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Wuthering Heights (1920 movie)
